df-sseq
blocks.content: Define a builder for sequences by strong recursion, i.e. by computing the value of the n-th element of the sequence from all preceding elements and not just the previous one. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-sseq(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(csseq, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cun(cv(s0), ccom(clsw, cseq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmpo(s2, s3, universe, universe, co(cv(s2), cconcat, cs1(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), cxp(cn0, csn(co(cv(s0), cconcat, cs1(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: subiwrd
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ sseqp1 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm subiwrd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), cword(c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), cword(c2))), wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), cword(c2))), wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0)))
  syl(w0, wcel(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), cword(c2)), wf(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), co(nat0, cfzo, c1), c2))
  sylancl(w0, wf(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), co(nat0, cfzo, c1), c2), wf(c0, cn0, c2), wss(co(nat0, cfzo, c1), cn0))
  fzo0ssnn0(c1)
  fssres(c0, cn0, c2, co(nat0, cfzo, c1))
  iswrdi(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: subiwrdlen
blocks.content: Length of a subword of an infinite word. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm subiwrdlen(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1))), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1))), c1)), wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe)))
  eqtrd(cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1))), c1, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1))), cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c1))), wfn(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), co(nat0, cfzo, c1)))
  sylancl(w0, wfn(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), wfn(c0, cn0), wss(co(nat0, cfzo, c1), cn0))
  ffnd(c0, cn0, c2, w0)
  fzo0ssnn0(c1)
  fnssres(c0, cn0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1))
  hashfn(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), co(nat0, cfzo, c1))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), c1), wcel(c1, cn0))
  hashfzo0(c1)
}

thm iwrdsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), cconcat, cs1(cfv(c0, c1)))))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
} = {
  eqtr3d(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), cconcat, cs1(cfv(c0, c1))), co(co(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), cpfx, co(cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), cmin, nat1)), cconcat, cs1(cfv(clsw, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))))), w0)

  mpbird(w0, wne(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), emptycls), wbr(nat1, cle, cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))))
  breqtrrd(nat1, cle, cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), co(c1, caddc, nat1), w0)
  sylancr(w0, wbr(nat1, cle, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(c1, cn0))
  1re()
  nn0addge2(nat1, c1)
  syl(w0, wb(wne(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), emptycls), wbr(nat1, cle, cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))))), wcel(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), cword(c2)))
  wrdlenge1n0(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), c2)
  pfxlswccat(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), c2)
  oveq12d(co(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), cpfx, co(cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), cmin, nat1)), cconcat, cs1(cfv(clsw, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))), cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), cs1(cfv(c0, c1)), w0)
  3eqtrd(co(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), cpfx, co(cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), cmin, nat1)), cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), co(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), cpfx, c1), cres(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), w0)
  oveq2d(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), cpfx, co(cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), cmin, nat1), c1, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), cpfx, c1), cres(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(nat0, cfzo, c1))), wcel(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), cword(c2)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))))))
  eleqtrrd(c1, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))), co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), w0)
  syl21anc(w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(nat1, cn0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c1)))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c1, cn0))
  nn0fz0(c1)
  imp(wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(nat1, cn0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  elfz0add(c1, nat1, c1)
  oveq2d(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), co(c1, caddc, nat1), w0)
  pfxres(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), c2, c1)
  3syl(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(nat0, cfzo, c1)), cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c1))), wcel(c1, cn0), wss(co(nat0, cfzo, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  fzossfzop1(c1)
  resabs1(co(nat0, cfzo, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), c0)
  s1eqd(cfv(clsw, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), cfv(c0, c1), w0)
  3eqtrd(cfv(clsw, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), cmin, nat1)), cfv(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(clsw, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), cfv(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), cmin, nat1))), wcel(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), cword(c2)))
  subiwrd(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1), c2, w0)
  lsw(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), cword(c2))
  fveq2d(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), cmin, nat1), c1, w0)
  mvrraddd(cfv(chash, cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), nat1, c1, w0)
  nn0cnd(c1, w0)
  1cnd(w0)
  subiwrdlen(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1), c2, w0)
  nn0addcld(c1, nat1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat1, cn0))
  1nn0()
  3syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cres(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), c1), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  fzonn0p1(c1)
  fvres(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), c0)

blocks.name: sseqval
blocks.content: Value of the strong sequence builder function. The set ` W ` represents here the words of length greater than or equal to the lenght of the initial sequence ` M ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sseqval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, csseq, c1), cun(c0, ccom(clsw, cseq(cfv(chash, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, co(cv(s0), cconcat, cs1(cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), cxp(cn0, csn(co(c0, cconcat, cs1(cfv(c1, c0))))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cword(c2)))

  nn0zd(cfv(chash, c0), wcel(c0, cword(c2)))

  uzid(cfv(chash, c0))
  mp2b(wb(wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, c0))))), wf(chash, universe, cun(cn0, csn(cpnf))), wfn(chash, universe))

blocks.name: sseqfres
blocks.content: The first elements in the strong recursive sequence are the sequence initializer. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sseqfres(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cres(co(c0, csseq, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cword(c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cin(cword(c2), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c3, c2))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wceq(cres(co(c0, csseq, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), c0), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, csseq, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
